intro.title: Michael Kobtsev
intro.subtitle: React Front-end developer in search of interesting projects and proposals
intro.description: I specialize on creating user interfaces & developing rich web applications. I have experience working with big international company & creating many demo projects in this area.

about.text: Hello, my name is Michael, I’m <0>20 years</0> old <0>Computer science student in NSU</0> who is interested in creating web applications<1></1><1></1>I have about <0>2 years experience</0> in which I managed to work on 2 commercial projects and over 10 demo projects<1></1><1></1> At first I was practicing as a <0> Python Full-stack developer </0> and now decided to choose a narrower focus<1></1><1></1> Main technologies I’ve been working with are shown on the right

ic.description: Commercial web site for one of the largest exporters company of Polymers, Fertilisers & Sulphur

amdb.description: Site for Institute of Biology for storage, editing, searching and analysis researches and experiments

blogSite.description: Example of simple blog site with the division of posts into categories

polygonalAnimations.description: Generating animation of polygonal svg images with triangulation algorithm

animalShelter.description: Site of animal shelter with animals cards and search menu

djangoOAuth.description: Example of OAuth in Django with user profile and settings pages

carSearcher.description: Filter search example with cars models
